short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crop selected area of the screen and copy to clipboard as text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
img2text is a service which is used to convert an image into text. img2text is focused on converting images that only contain text, but if you provide an image with no text, you may get some unreadable signs. There is an img2text extension that works the same but crops the selected area of your browser and converts it into text.

✔ Secure by design
✔ Capture Viewport
✔ Crop and Save (automatic save)
✔ Configurable Keyboard Shortcut
✔ Save screenshot as text to clipboard
✔ No special permissions required

Supported languages: English, Russian, French, Spanish, Arabic and Chinese.
